attributes.action: Indefinite Leave to Remain for NHS Staff
attributes.additional_details: We are facing an unprecedented and uncertain future. Our beloved NHS is powered and supported by many EU and non EU immigrants, they are putting their collective lives on the line for us and should be rewarded with leave to remain or British Citizenship should they wish.
attributes.background: All NHS staff to have a permanent right to remain the UK
